extension.name: Events Booking - Zoom
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin is used to automatically register attendees for a Zoom Webibar or Zoom Meetings via Zooms API via JWT Token. See https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/guides/build/jwt-app

field.name: zoom_jwt
field.label: Zoom JWT ID
field.description: Enter your Zoom JWT ID from the zoom app store

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show on frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend event submission form
